title: Scourge.Outbreak.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Game  Language: Eng |Rus | Multi6

System requirements:
Operating system: Windows XP (32-Bit), Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon X2, or equivalent, running at 1.86 GHz or greater
Memory: 2 GB
Video: 256 MB compatible with DirectX 9
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 4.1 GB

Description:

2026 comes, and the world is ruled from behind the scenes power-hungry 
corporation "Nogaro", the developer of a new powerful source of energy 
called "Ambrosia". Unknown population globe Ambrosia - fruit research 
mysterious meteorite fragment, which owns "Nogaro". To save it, it will 
go on anything. Challenge corporation "Nogaro" dares only one 
organization - Initiative "Tarn", an anonymous group of saboteurs - opponents 
corporations intending to reveal the truth about Ambrosia and break the iron grip, 
which "Nogaro" keeps the world. In the game "Scourge: Outbreak" you lead a 
detachment of "Echo" - an elite group of mercenaries whose initiative "Tarn" 
requested inflict a decisive blow corporation "Nogaro". Other orders 
initiatives "Tarn" entrusted with distracting attack, and the detachment 
"Echo" is worth the most important task: first, to find and rescue Dr. Reysbeka, 
double agent "Tarn" Corporation "Nogaro"; second, to grab a piece of the meteorite 
that is stored in the depths of laboratories "Nogaro". Powerful arsenal of weapons 
and special abilities to help crush all obstacles on your way to finding the truth 
about the terrible fuel technology "Ambrosia" corporation "Nogaro". Campaign mode 
of interaction with support for up to 4 players and with full support for connecting 
and disconnecting the players during the game. Through memories that only sees your 
character and find out how they are consistent with what they see your friends! 
The whole experience and all gaming skills obtained in Campania, you remain in the 
multiplayer modes for 8 players. Gameplay Scourge: Outbreak mode mortal combat, 
mortal combat command and capture the flag is very fleeting, and will stand in 
good stead fast reflexes, sensitive fingers and constant motion! You wait 5 shrouded 
death maps for multiplayer games in which you will be able to continue the slaughter 
group "Echo" with security "Nogaro" for supremacy on the island Nogaro!
